blog.title: Ravings of a Lunatic
blog.description:
I make gifs, reviews of media, and goofy captions on screenshots. Now I also do video editing and webdev & design at reasonable prices!
Like my blog? Throw me some money at paypal.me/RHawkins44 if you want.

summary: not a single person asked for this but
title: not a single person asked for this but
body:
yeah yeah isabelle adopts snake bayonetta adopts joker but have you considered:

the koopalings adopt king k rool as their cool uncle and bowser just lets it happen because they just love him so much and he hasn’t seen the kids get that happy and excited in a long time

reblog.comment:

the koopalings adopt king k rool as their cool uncle and bowser just lets it happen because they just love him so much and he hasn’t seen the kids get that happy and excited in a long time

blog.name: thevideogameartarchive
blog.title: The Video Game Art Archive
blog.description:
The Video Game Art Archive is dedicated to scanning and extracting classic video game artwork at the best resolutions possible!

Support us on Patreon!
We update four times a day with new artwork from long forgotten games that have never had their art available. Looking for a specific game? Check out the Archive! You might get lucky!
Also follow our other blog: Want to help us continue our work? Help via PayPAL

summary:
Video: Cuphead Nintendo Switch Handheld Mode Gameplay

The first gameplay footage of Cuphead has already appeared, thanks to...
caption:
Video: Cuphead Nintendo Switch Handheld Mode Gameplay

The first gameplay footage of Cuphead has already appeared, thanks to GameXplain. GameXplain has already received the full game, and have decided to showcase the game in both handheld and docked mode.

reblog.comment:
Video: Cuphead Nintendo Switch Handheld Mode Gameplay

The first gameplay footage of Cuphead has already appeared, thanks to GameXplain. GameXplain has already received the full game, and have decided to showcase the game in both handheld and docked mode.

trail.content_raw:
Video: Cuphead Nintendo Switch Handheld Mode Gameplay

The first gameplay footage of Cuphead has already appeared, thanks to GameXplain. GameXplain has already received the full game, and have decided to showcase the game in both handheld and docked mode.
trail.content:

The first gameplay footage of Cuphead has already appeared, thanks to GameXplain. GameXplain has already received the full game, and have decided to showcase the game in both handheld and docked mode.

blog.name: triplemuse
blog.title: The more the marrier~!
blog.description:
A multimuse Ask/RP sideblog of triple-star, run alongside two other blogs! Read rules for more info before interacting!

Series involved include Kirby, Pokemon, Animal Crossing, Splatoon, Smash Bros, and Mole's World.

title: Multimuse Blog~!
body:
Hey hey, @triple-star here with another sideblog! This time, a multimuse, containing mostly Nintendo characters [And a few others]! Could you please reblog this if you’re interested in interacting? Thanks a bunch!

-10 years RP experience
-Open to crossovers and OCs
-Several Smash Bros-compatible muses
-Semi-selective
-Read rules before interacting, please!
-Run alongside @gleaming-darkness [World of Light spoiler warning]

reblog.comment:

summary: A Cuphead Developer Says That Microsoft Approached Them And Asked If They'd Like To Make A Switch Version
title: A Cuphead Developer Says That Microsoft Approached Them And Asked If They'd Like To Make A Switch Version
body:
A Cuphead Developer Says That Microsoft Approached Them And Asked If They’d Like To Make A Switch Version

Yesterday’s announcement of a Nintendo Switch version of Cupheadwas quite a bombshell, and we’ve been gradually hearing more details on how this project came to be. Daniel Bloodworth of Easy Allies has been a GDC, where he talked to one of the devs behind the game. Bloodworth found out that “Microsoft actually approached them and asked if they’d like to make a Switch version”. The tweet is down…

View On WordPress

blog.name: my-km-me
blog.description: My One True Pairings: Power Bottom T'Challa + Alpha N'Jadaka; or Alphas [N'Jadaka + T'Challa]  (Marvel Cinematic Universe), Alpha Michiko + Omega Atsuko (Michiko to Hatchin), Kevin + submissive Chiron (Moonlight), Spawn + Wanda (Spawn), Lotor + non-dominate Allura (Voltron: The Legendary Defender), Kylo + Rey (Star Wars)

summary: Ranking Nintendo games from favorite to least liked
title: Ranking Nintendo games from favorite to least liked
body:
(Games are with the original console(s) they came from in mind)

Animal Crossing

  1. Animal Crossing: New Leaf
  2. Animal Crossing
  3. Animal Crossing: Wild World
  4. Animal Crossing: City Folk
  5. Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp

Donkey Kong Country

  1. Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy’s Kong Quest
  2. Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze
  3. Donkey Kong Country Returns 3D
  4. Donkey Kong Country
  5. Donkey Kong 64
  6. Donkey Kong Country 3: Dixie Kong’s Double Trouble!

Earthbound

  1. Mother 3
  2. Earthbound Beginnings
  3. Earthbound

Endless Ocean

  1. Endless Ocean 2: Blue World
  2. Endless Ocean (”least liked”)

F-Zero

  1. F-Zero X
  2. F-Zero GX
  3. F-Zero

Fire Emblem

  • https://my-km-me.tumblr.com/post/183124602469/my-rankings-for-each-rpg-series-from-fave-to-least

Game & Watch Gallery

  1. Game & Watch Gallery 4
  2. Game & Watch Gallery 2
  3. Game & Watch Gallery 3
  4. Game & Watch Gallery
  5. Game Boy Gallery

Kid Icarus

  1. Kid Icarus: Uprising
  2. Kid Icarus

Kirby

  1. Kirby Air Ride
  2. Kirby’s Return to Dream Land
  3. Kirby Star Allies (after updates)
  4. Kirby & the Amazing Mirror
  5. Kirby 64: The Crystal Shards
  6. Kirby Super Star Ultra
  7. Kirby Super Star
  8. Kirby’s Dream Land 3
  9. Kirby’s Adventure
  10. Kirby’s Epic Yarn
  11. Kirby’s Dream Land
  12. Kirby’s Dream Land 2
  13. Kirby Star Allies (w/o updates)

Kyle Hyde

  1. Last Window: The Secret of Cape West
  2. Hotel Dusk: Room 215 (”least liked”)

Luigi’s Mansion

  1. Luigi’s Mansion
  2. Luigi’s Mansion: Dark Moon
  3. Luigi’s Mansion remake

Mario

  • https://my-km-me.tumblr.com/post/183123813944/super-mario-bros-rankings-from-fave-to-least

Metroid

  1. Metroid: Zero Mission
  2. (Honorary fangame: AM2R, particularly for the extra modes)
  3. Metroid: Fusion (JP)
  4. Super Metroid
  5. Metroid Prime
  6. Metroid Prime 2: Echoes
  7. Metroid: Samus Returns
  8. Metroid
  9. Metroid: Fusion (US)
  10. Metroid Prime 3: Corruption
  11. Metroid: Other M
  12. Metroid II: Return of Samus

Nintendo Wars

  1. Advance Wars
  2. Game Boy Wars 3
  3. Famicom Wars
  4. Advance Wars 2: Black Hole Rising

Pokémon

  • https://my-km-me.tumblr.com/post/183124602469/my-rankings-for-each-rpg-series-from-fave-to-least

Star Fox

  1. Star Fox 2
  2. Star Fox 64
  3. Star Fox
  4. Star Fox Command
  5. Starlink: Battle for Atlas
  6. Star Fox: Assault
  7. Star Fox Adventures
  8. Star Fox 64 3D
  9. Star Fox Zero

Super Smash Bros. 

  1. Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
  2. Super Smash Bros. 4 Wii U (w/o updates)
  3. Super Smash Bros. 4 3DS (best classic mode)
  4. Super Smash Bros. 4 Wii U (w/ updates)

Tetris

  1. Tetris ‘99
  2. Tetris (NES)
  3. Tetris DX
  4. Tetris (CDI) (love the music)

The Legend of Zelda (2D)

  1. The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
  2. The Legend of Zelda: A Link Between Worlds
  3. The Legend of Zelda: Oracle games together
  4. The Legend of Zelda
  5. The Legend of Zelda: Link’s Awakening (DX)
  6. The Legend of Zelda: The Minish Cap
  7. Zelda II: The Adventure of Link

The Legend of Zelda (3D)

  1. The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
  2. The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
  3. The Legend of Zelda: Majora’s Mask
  4. The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker
  5. Hyrule Warriors: Definitive Edition
  6. The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
  7. The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword

Wario Land

  1. Wario Land II
  2. Wario Land: Super Mario Land 3
  3. Virtual Boy Wario Land (greyscale)
  4. Wario World
  5. Wario Land 3
  6. Wario Land 4
  7. Wario Land: Shake It

Wario puzzles

  1. WarioWare Gold
  2. Wario’s Woods
  3. WarioWare: Twisted
  4. WarioWare, Inc.: Mega Microgame$
  5. Mario & Wario
  6. Game & Wario

Wave Race

  1. Wave Race 64
  2. Wave Race: Blue Storm

Xenoblade Chronicles

  1. Xenoblade Chronicles
  2. Xenoblade Chronicles X

Yoshi

  1. Yoshi’s Island: Super Mario World 2
  2. Yoshi’s Woolly World
  3. Tetris Attack
  4. Yoshi’s Crafted World
  5. Yoshi's Story (melons only)
  6. Poochy’s & Yoshi’s Woolly World
  7. Yoshi’s Safari
  8. Yoshi’s Island: Super Mario Advance 3
  9. Yoshi’s Cookie (SNES)
  10. Yoshi's Story (regular play)
  11. Yoshi (NES)
  12. Yoshi’s Island DS
  13. Yoshi’s New Island

Misc. of other favorites in ABC order

  1. ARMS
  2. Baten Kaitos: Origins
  3. Bayonetta 2
  4. Devil World
  5. Meteos
  6. Sin and Punishment: Star Successor

tags: El creador de Cuphead quisiera ver a sus personajes en Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
summary: El creador de Cuphead quisiera ver a sus personajes en Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
title: El creador de Cuphead quisiera ver a sus personajes en Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
body:
Durante la GDC 2019, Game Informer ha platicado con los creadores de Cuphead, quienes afirman querer ver a los protagonistas del juego en Super Smash Bros. Ultimate. Jared Moldenhauer, dijo que siempre “He soñado con Smash Bros. y que Cuphead y Mugman estén allí”, afirma. En palabras textuales, dijo: “Básicamente, si los fans lo desean, no entendería […]

La entrada El creador de Cuphead quisiera ver a sus personajes en Super Smash Bros. Ultimate aparece primero en Versus Media México | Videojuegos, Cine, Tecnología, TV, Cultura..


El creador de Cuphead quisiera ver a sus personajes en Super Smash Bros. Ultimate

blog.name: inklingleesquidly
blog.title:
(+++++LEE SQUIDLY+++++)
★THE STAR SCOUT★
blog.description:
The splat-tastic adventures of mild mannered Inkling boy, Lee Squidly , his friends, and his ever-loving mom, Janine. Come for commissioned art, fashions, pics from Booyah Base, and  lots more. Ask the Squidlys any questions you like, they love the company and making new friends.
SWITCH FC: 7050-8035-7249
My NNID: Squall_Lee

summary:
ART by @flameeliwoodart 
Yokai are always up to no good. Even Lee isn't immune to their influence but at least he and Guist ...
body:
ART by @flameeliwoodart

Yokai are always up to no good. Even Lee isn’t immune to their influence but at least he and Guist played a harmless prank on Juddinyan.

If you enjoy the Pocket Sized Sillies please Like & RB it really helps out
